mapper.insert: insert into partner( company_number, part_name, boss_name, part_phone, addr,zip_code,road_name,detail_addr, p_start, p_end, m_num ) values( #{company_number}, #{part_name}, #{boss_name}, #{part_phone}, #{addr}, #{zip_code}, #{road_name}, #{detail_addr}, TO_DATE(#{p_start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{p_end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{m_num} )
mapper.update: update member set partner_signal = partner_signal + 1 where m_num = #{m_num}
